---
category: news
title: "Kerala HC to implement machine learning system to verify bail applications"
excerpt: "Kochi: For the first time in India, Kerala HC is all set to implement a machine learning system for checking bail pleas. From July 10, bail applications will be verified via a special software and will be accepted only in the prescribed format."
